byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED and QUENTIN HARDY

lead_paragraph: Intel is close to buying fellow chip maker Altera for more than $15 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Friday, the latest sign of consolidation in the semiconductor industry.

headline.print_headline: Intel Takeover of Altera Is Expected as Chip Industry Consolidates
headline.main: Intel Takeover of Altera Is Expected

snippet: Intel is close to buying fellow chip maker Altera for more than $15 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Friday, the latest sign of consolidation in the semiconductor industry.
abstract: Intel is near deal to buy rival chip maker Altera for more than $15 billion, in further consolidation of semiconductor industry.
